title: [Health] Study: In a concerning trend for the health of US children, the rate of underinsured youngsters rose from 30.6% to 34%—an additional 2.4 million kids—from 2016 to 2019. This was driven by rising insurance inadequacy, mainly experienced as high out-of-pocket expenses for health services.

[Neuroscience] Viagra Prescription Associated With a 69% Reduction in Alzheimer’s Risk: The drug was identified by a computational analysis of drug-target interactions. Backing up the in silico finding was data from US insurers suggesting a reduction in AD risk after prescription and in vitro analysis of tau.
